evidence.text: For these reasons, Ms. Ratlieff demands judgment against all defendants (but the City) for damages, punitive damages, prejudgment interest on liquidated damages as allowed by law, costs of this action, reasonable attorney’s fees, injunctive relief, and any other relief this Court deems just and proper.
